Text: Great upload!! Good audio and picture quality. No trailers, extras and shit only movie + DTS. Just as it should be...

Great Upload!!!..Shanks!!!.. saves me going to the local video store he he... My only whinge would be the file size... Being almost 9GB, why not encode the movie to 7.95GB enabling the option to burn to DL-DVD??? 

I ended up converting the DTS to AC3 5.1 so I could do this.. Lost minimal quality but Id rather downgrade audio before video!!! :D

Thanks again!!!
